title: The Slow Regard of Silent Things - Patrick Rothfuss
description:
Deep below the University, there is a dark place. Few people know of it: a broken web of ancient passageways and abandoned rooms. A young woman lives there, tucked among the sprawling tunnels of the Underthing, snug in the heart of this forgotten place.

Her name is Auri, and she is full of mysteries.

The Slow Regard of Silent Things is a brief, bittersweet glimpse of AuriÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s life, a small adventure all her own. At once joyous and haunting, this story offers a chance to see the world through AuriÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s eyes. And it gives the reader a chance to learn things that only Auri knows...

In this book, Patrick Rothfuss brings us into the world of one of The Kingkiller ChronicleÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s most enigmatic characters. Full of secrets and mysteries, The Slow Regard of Silent Things is the story of a broken girl trying to live in a broken world
